bioghist.p: J.P. Horn & Company and Campion & Company were Philadelphia publishers.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of business records of J.P. Horn & Co. and Campion & Co. Materials include: 1914-1919 payment book; 1925-1931 account book; 1926-1929 record of sales by agent; 1928-1929 invoice books (2 volumes); and 1929 order books (2 volumes -- one for J.P. Horn and one for Campion & Co.).

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
